DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Thoracic Manipulation Techniques Improve Neck Pain Dentistry Students
DOC.criteria: Current student Arizona School Dentistry Oral Health ( ASDOH ) A. T. Still University Primary complaint neck pain without symptom spread one arm Overall rating neck pain intensity least 3/10 ; overall rating overall average participant 's rating current , least , bad pain experience previous 24 hour separate numeric pain rating scale 0 corresponds `` pain '' 10 corresponds `` bad pain possible '' . Neck Disability Index ( NDI ) score > 10 point ( measure selfreported disability 0 50 point scale high score indicate high level disability . Proficient speak read English complete outcome questionnaire Neck pain related motor vehicle accident trauma within previous 6 week Neck pain spread arm Low back pain thoracic origin pain Nerve root involvement ; define presence two neurological finding ( e.g . decreased strength , diminish deep tendon reflex , decrease sensation ) nerve root level Diagnosis cervical spine stenosis ( narrowing central canal contains spinal cord ) History spinal tumor , spinal infection , cervical spine fracture , previous neck surgery Pending legal action relate current episode neck pain Contraindications thoracic spine thrust manipulation 1. serious pathology condition ( tumor , fracture , metabolic disease , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , history prolong steroid use ) 2. hyperreflexia 3. unsteadiness gait 4 . Nystagmus 5 . Loss visual acuity 6 . Impaired sensation face 7 . Altered taste 8 . The presence pathological reflex 9. pregnancy consider pregnancy
